titleStmt.title: The case of all persons comprized in the articles or capitulations of the city of Waterford, fort and castle of Bophin, and the towns of Sligo and Drogheda in the kingdom of Ireland, humbly offered to the consideration of the knights citizens and burgesses in Parliament assembled.

The case of all persons comprized in the articles or capitulations of the city of Waterford, fort and castle of Bophin, and the towns of Sligo and Drogheda in the kingdom of Ireland, humbly offered to the consideration of the knights citizens and burgesses in Parliament assembled.

notesStmt.note: Half-title on p. [2]: The case of persons comprized in the articles of Waterford, Bophin, Sligo, and Drogheda, in the kingdom of Ireland.
Reproduction of the original in the Lincoln's Inn Library.
